sentences.en: Anaxagoras called these minuscule particles which have something of everything in them seeds.
sentences.cn: 安纳萨哥拉斯称呼这些含有“各物的一部分”的“小粒子”为“种子”.

sentences.en: Both create huge effects from minuscule changes.
sentences.cn: 都是微小变化产生巨大作用.

sentences.en: Commissions may appear to be a minuscule expense.
sentences.cn: 佣金看起来是很少的费用.

sentences.en: E . E . Cummings's poetry is written all in minuscule letters.
sentences.cn: 肯明斯的诗都是用小书写体写成的.

sentences.en: If the plane has empty seats , the cost of adding one more passenger is minuscule.
sentences.cn: 航空公司应该卖给他票吗?当然应该.

sentences.en: In the twentieth century, electron microscopes have provided direct views of viruses and minuscule surface structures.
sentences.cn: 20世纪电子显微镜提供了对病毒和极微物体的表面结构的直接观察.

sentences.en: The damage is minor, it a minuscule tear, but it has to heal.
sentences.cn: 伤势很轻微, 是极小的撕裂, 但是也得医治.

sentences.en: The film was shot in 17 days, a minuscule amount of time.
sentences.cn: 这部电影仅用短短的17天便拍摄完毕。

sentences.en: The human race only a minuscule portion of the earth's history.
sentences.cn: 人类只有占有极小部分地球历史.

words.tran_cn: 极小的；用草写小字写的
